column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Okay , forget about setting up camp .
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh , I did n't realize the baby still needed someone to tuck her in bed .
#Text=" Aang says : " Come on guys , there 's something after us and we do n't even know what or who it is .
#Text=" Katara says : " It could be Zuko .
#Text=We have n't seem him since the North Pole .
#Text=" Toph says : " Who 's Zuko ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , just some angry freak with a ponytail who 's tracked us all over the world .
#Text=" Katara says : " What 's wrong with ponytails , Ponytail ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is a warrior 's wolf tail .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , it certainly tells the other warriors that you 're fun and perky .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Anyway , whoever 's chasing us could n't have followed us here , so , now would everyone just shhh ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " No Momo , shhh .
#Text=Sleepy time .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , do n't tell me ... " Aang says : " That 's impossible .
#Text=There 's no way they could have tracked us .
#Text=" Toph says : " I can feel it with my own two feet !
#Text=" Katara says : " Let 's get out of here .
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe we should face them .
#Text=Find out who they are .
#Text=Who knows , maybe they 're friendly .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Always the optimist ... "
